backend/main.mo: Actor storing click counts in a map with methods to record clicks and query counts individually or all at once.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking product requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of brief summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA metadata, icons, social meta tags, and root div for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, theme colors, start behavior, and icons.
frontend/public/offline.html: Styled offline fallback page with auto-reload logic and connection checks.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and offline-first fetch handling with an offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing all site sections, handling navigation scroll logic, and registering the service worker.
frontend/src/components/BoostlyLink.tsx: Component displaying the site's URL with a copy-to-clipboard button and temporary success state.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a multi-column footer with brand info, resource links, social icons, and a copyright note.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays a hero banner with growth messaging, action buttons, and a featured image.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides a simple page layout wrapper with vertical flex structure.
frontend/src/components/MarketingNav.tsx: Implements a responsive navigation bar with scroll effects, search, and mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/BroadTo: Shows guidance cards for broad content topics with tips, categories, and optional disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/sections/Content: Displays cards detailing different content types with descriptions, tips, and disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/sections/CoreGro: Renders a section displaying core growth tips and actionable checklists using cards populated from growthTips and checklists data.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqSect: Displays a FAQ section with collapsible accordion items sourced from the faqs content array.
frontend/src/components/sections/GetBoos: Provides installation prompts and instructions for the Boostly PWA, adapting UI based on installability and installation state.
frontend/src/components/sections/Payment: Shows Cash App monetization info, tracks click counts, and provides a payment link card with setup alerts if unconfigured.
frontend/src/components/sections/Platfor: Displays platform-specific growth tips using tabbed navigation with icons and cards populated from platformTips data.
frontend/src/components/sections/Subscri: Renders subscription plan options, tracks plan click counts, and opens configured subscription links for monthly or annual plans.
frontend/src/components/sections/ToolsRe: Renders a resources section displaying categorized tool cards with icons and external links. Uses a forwardRef and maps categories into UI cards.
frontend/src/components/SiteSearch.tsx: Provides an interactive search bar with live results, keyboard navigation, and result selection.
frontend/src/config/cashAppLinks.ts: Exports a configurable Cash App payment URL placeholder for external payment redirection.
frontend/src/config/subscriptionLinks.ts: Defines and exports Stripe checkout URLs for monthly and annual subscription plans.
Exports structured guidance items for broad content topics, including mental health, learning, and collaboration, with tips and metadata.
frontend/src/content/contentTypeGuidance: Provides definitions and arrays of content-type guidance items, each with tips, keywords, and optional disclaimers.
frontend/src/content/growthGuidance.ts: Contains growth tips and checklists for social media strategy, covering optimization, consistency, engagement, and analytics.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Centralized platform-specific tips and FAQs for search indexing, covering Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, LinkedIn, X, and more.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persisted identities using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePaymentClickCounts: Fetches and updates backend-stored payment button click counts using react-query and actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Tracks PWA installability, handles beforeinstallprompt events, and exposes an install trigger.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook exposing actor and loading state for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, typography, dark mode, utilities, and UI animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, react-query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker on page load if supported.
frontend/src/search/scrollAndHighlight.t: Scrolls to an element smoothly and applies a temporary highlight effect for search navigation.
frontend/src/search/searchIndex.ts: Builds and queries a searchable index of site content with tokenization and scoring logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling themes, custom colors, animations, fonts, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the current Boostly project state, including app goals, search and content taxonomy plans, and monetization decisions. Lists existing features, architectural notes, and versioning info for ongoing development.
